instructions: Shake and strain over ice.

name: Nutty Belgian
instructions: Serve over ice.

name: Pain Killer
instructions: Fill cup with ice. Pour Pusser's Rum to fill about 1/4 of the glass. Fill with an equal amount of Cream of Coconut (Coco Lopez is good. Add some pineapple juice and a good splash of orange juice. Shake well. Add cherry and sprinkly nutmeg. Grab a staw and get ready! This was originally made in the Britsh Virgin Islands -- Pussers is the official rum of the Royal British Navy. Alter the amount of rum to your taste. Sorry about the inexact measurements -- that's the way we do it down in de islans mon!

name: Painter's Delight
instructions: Pour Gin, Curacao, Pernod and the Juice from 1/2 Lemon into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill up with soda, stir and serve.

name: Pajama Jackhammer
instructions: Mix all ingredients and serve with shaved ice.

name: Paisano
instructions: Ice Glass. Add Vodka and Frangelico just like any other drink. Fill with milk. Shake because it is a milk drink.

name: Palm Beach Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Pain, Pain, Go Away
instructions: Pour tabasco sauce in first, then whiskey and cream. Mix well.

name: Paisley Martini
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Palmer Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Palmetto Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Palmetto
instructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled Hurricane glass. Float Meyers Rum on top and garnish with a pineapple spear.

name: Pam's Root Beer Float
instructions: Fill the glass with ice, add 2 shots Irish Cream and fill with cola. Mix gently, it will be very foamy!

name: Pamela
instructions: Simply make a standard vodka and tonic and garnish liberally with sliced cucumbers. sounds funny, but makes a great hot weather drink.

name: Pamoyo
instructions: In a large container, mix the same amount of Gin, Sprite, and Grape Juice. Mix well and cool. Serve in shot glasses.

name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #4
instructions: Mix ingredients. Can be either: 1. muddled with lime -- 2. served on crushed ice but preferably in hurricane or pint glass with 5-7 regular icecubes (no need to water it down, only to make cold)

name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #2
instructions: Splash a puddle of Angostura bitters into a saucer and place the sugar cube in it to soak. This will take a minute ot two. Stir the Champagne (or sparkling wine), the Vodka and the Blue Curacao together in a container and put into the fridge to chill. Place the soaked sugar cube in the bottom of the Champagne glass, pour in the mixture and add drop in the cocktail onion, which should be loose, not on a cocktail stick.

name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #3
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cooler, chill, and serve. As with most punches, it's hard to be specific about the amounts used. A general rule: pour as much of everything as tastes good, then add more vodka! To make life more interesting, throw in pieces of fruit, and add dry ice to the cooler before serving. Small plastic animals also make a nice garnish (but don't drink them)!

name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #5
instructions: Fill Collins glass with ice. Add 2 oz. of vodka and 1 oz. triple sec. Fill glass almost to the top with pineapple juice, add Grenadine for color, and top off the glass with 7-Up or Slice. Shake or stir until the drink turns a light orange-pink color.

name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster (Zaphod's)
instructions: Fill the glass, mug or whatever about 3/4 with ice. Then, add the J.D., Schnapps and Curacao. Fill up the rest of the glass with orange juice, and stir.

name: Penthouse
instructions: Pour ingredients in the glas. Shoot it down. Have a limewedge afterwards.

name: Pepe's Flame of Love Martini
instructions: As explained from the great bartender Pepe Ruiz of Beverly Hills Chasen's Restauraunt: "You swirl a few drops of La Ina Sherry in a chilled stem glass and pour it out. Than squeeze a strip of Orange peel into the glass and flambe' it with a with match. Throw away the peel. Now fill the glass with Ice to chill again, then throw that out. Add vodka, than flambe' another orange peel around the rim. Now throw out the second burnt peel. Then just stir it gently. And drink, drink."

name: Pepito Lolito
instructions: Add gin and Curaco, more gin than curaco. Mix the soda, which should have orange flavour (eg. Fanta or something like that) and the tonic, 1/2 of each. Fill up until the bitter gin taste is gone, and the drink is all green. Be sure that all the ingredients are very cold, and add ice. To make it perfect, a slice of lemon is to be slid around the edge of the glass, and then put in the drink.

name: Peppermint Crisp
instructions: Blend the creme de menthe and the kahlua together, then top up the rest of the glass with ice cold milk. Also nice with ice cubes.

name: Peppermint Beach
instructions: Mix with ice. Serve cold. [Our studies show this drink to taste quite foul at the beginning of the evening but rather refreshing after several other drinks have been consumed.]

name: Peppermint Patty (Northern Style)
instructions: Served Chilled. Pour equally.

name: Pepper Slammer
instructions: add southern comfort to glass with ice. fill with dr. pepper pop.

name: Peppermint Aztec
instructions: Pour liquids together in the order listed, then stand peppermint stick or cane inside of cup.

name: Peppermint Patty
instructions: Put a shot of peppermint schnapps in your mouth. Do not swallow. Squirt chocolate (not too much!) into your mouth. Shake head vigorously and then swallow.

name: Peppermint Pattie
instructions: fill glass with ice pour creme de cacao and the creme de menthe over ice. stir and enjoy. Is best after dinner but can be enjoyed anytime.

name: Peppermint Stick
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Peregrine's Peril
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Pixie Stix
instructions: Pour SoCo and Amaretto over ice in a highball glass. Fill with sweet and sour mix and top off with a splash of sprite. Float grenadine on top. Garnish with maraschino cherries.

name: Pixy Stick
instructions: Add ice to glass. Add shot of Southern Comfort. Fill glass with Lemonade. leaving enough room on top to add the shot of Blackberry Brandy.

name: Piña Rita
instructions: Shake over ice. Serve in sugar rimmed glass with shaved ice in it . Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple slice.

name: Pixie Stick
instructions: Pour gin, then midori, then 7-up (to fill) over ice in a Tom Collins glass. Shake in cocktail shaker, add straw, cherry. Tastes like candy.

name: Pjolter Bay
instructions: Have it all in a shaker, add 50/50 Fanta orange/Lemon mix. Sahake. Serv in highball glass. garnish with lemon an cherry.

name: Placenta
instructions: Fill most of the shot glass with schnapps. Top it off with the Tequila Rose. Wait about 30 seconds for the Tequila Rose to curdle (thus the name). Slam it!

name: Platina Blonde
instructions: Poor Tequila in a glass, fill in with cream, stir.

name: Planter's Punch
instructions: Combine all ingrdients. Serve over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with lime wedge and maraschino cherry.

name: Platinum Grand Margarita
instructions: Salt the rim of your margarita glass and add freshly squeezed lime juice to your glass. Add margarita mix, tequila, grand marnier, cointreau, triple sec, irish mist, and 5 ice cubes in a shaker. Shake vigorously until thoroughly mixed and cold. Pour into margarita glass and garnish with a lime wheel. Adding a maraschino cherry is an interesting touch.

name: Player's Passion
instructions: You pour the cognac in first. Next pour the Alizé. Last pour in the Champagne and stir.

name: The Player
instructions: Start with cold, preferrably frosted beer mug. Fill with 4 shots of Tequila, and pour orange juice in. Next add strawberry daiquiri mix on top. Wait two minutes and always serve cold, with ice if necessary.

name: Plaza Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except pineapple stick) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the stick of pineapple and serve.

name: Plead the 5th
instructions: mix all on the rocks,shake,strain,and serve.

name: PMS Special
instructions: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a martini glass.

name: Pocima
instructions: Pour the six beer cans, the liter of Vodka and the two gallons of orange juice along with the ice cubes in to the punch bowl. Stir, and serve cold.

name: Plum Liqueur
instructions: Wash plums and pat dry. Cut plums in half or smaller, pit. Place plums in aging container. Pour sugar over plums, stir. Add vodka and brandy stirring to partly disolve sugar. Cap container and place in a cool, dark place for 2 months, stir occasionally. Place a strainer over large bowl and strain liqueur. Press liquid from plums with the back of a wooden spoon. Discard plum pulp. Re-strain liqueur through cloth until clear. Bottle as desired. Ready for drinking or cooking but best if aged another month.

name: Poire Fantastic
instructions: Take a Highball glass, pour in the Poire au Cognac. Add Sprite. Put in some ice if you want.

name: Martini (Dry) (5-to-1)
instructions: Stir gin and vermouth with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, add the olive, and serve.

name: Martini #4
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist or the olive.

name: Poison Apple
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice in shaker. Shake and strain into shot glass.

name: Martini (Traditional 2-to-1)
instructions: Stir gin and vermouth over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, add the olive, and serve.

name: Mary Garden Cocktail
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: The Marv Alberts
instructions: Fill glass with 3 oz of Bailey's Irish Creme, then add 1 oz of Southern Comfort, followed by mixing in 1 oz of Buterscotch Schnapps.

name: Marvellaid
instructions: Chill martini glass. Mix equal parts stoli and Cointreau. Chill and strain. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Martini (Sweet)
instructions: Stir gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

name: Mary Pickford Cocktail
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, pineapple juice, maraschino liqueur, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Mary's Dream
instructions: Pour the rum, triple sec, orange juice, and orange bitters into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice.

name: Maryville Sweet
instructions: pour soouthern comfort and lime juice over ice, stir, enjoy

name: Masala Chai #2
instructions: Put water in a saucepan. Add the cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves and bring to a boil. Cover, turn heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Add the milk and sugar and bring to simmer again. Throw in the tea leaves, cover, and turn off the heat. After 2 minutes, strain the tea into two cups and serve immediately.

name: Matt's Tropical Punch
instructions: Build on the rocks and stir with a straw.

name: Masala Chai
instructions: Bring 2 cups of water to boil. Add all the ingredients and boil again for about 15 seconds. Let stand for a minute. Warm milk in a pot. Filter tea into cups. Add milk and sugar. That's IT.

name: Massacre
instructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass of ice. Stir well and serve.

name: Matisse
instructions: Chill glass. Shake Stoli Oranj over ice. Glaze glass with Chambord. Pour Stoli and garnish with twist of lime.

name: Maurizio's Dream
instructions: Chop the Lime, stir in with Cane Sugar and Ginger. Add the Crushed Ice and fill up with Apple Juice. Enjoy!

name: Matty's Magic Mixture
instructions: combine ingredients in mug and stir until fizzy

name: Max The Silent
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Maxim
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: May Blossum Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Mint Julep #2
instructions: Lightly muddle 4 of the mint sprigs with the sugar and a few drops of water in the bottom of the glass. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice. Add the bourbon and some short straws. Garnish with the remaining 2 mint sprigs.

name: Mint Gin Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mint Martini
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and creme de menthe. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with mint leaves.

name: Mint Julep #3
instructions: In electric blender, blend on high for a few seconds, until leaves are reduced. Strain into silver tumbler packed with shaved ice, add more Bourbon to saturate the ice, garnish with a sprig of mint.

name: Mint Julep #1
instructions: Muddle mint leaves, powdered sugar, and water in a collins glass. Fill glass with shaved or crushed ice and add bourbon. Top with more ice and garnish with a mint sprig. Serve with a straw.

name: Mint Russki, or Spearmint Ivan
instructions: 1. Place 3 to 6 twisted or crushed fresh mint leaves into a medium sized cocktail glass 2. Add 2 to 3 shots of your favorite frozen vodka 3. Add ice if desired 4. Stir lightly

name: Mint Russki
instructions: Add crushed or twisted leaves of mint, ice cubes, then frozen vodka. Stir and serve.

name: Minttini
instructions: Shake all ingredients with cubed ice, then pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a mint leaf.

name: Mint Condition
instructions: Fill the glass with ice, and pour the ingredients into the glass, stirring with a straw.

name: Mir
instructions: Pour both shots over rocks into a highball glass. Fill with coke, or soda of your choice.

name: Miss V
instructions: Shake. Serve over ice.

name: Miss Belle
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mississippi Planters Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Mister Christian
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mister Wu
instructions: Pour two ounces of whiskey and ounce of vodka on ice into a regular glass. Add three ounces of lemon-lime soda and a dash of orange juice. Serve and enjoy

name: Mint Tea
instructions: Pour Creme de Menthe over ice and add Iced Tea to taste. Homemade Iced Tea is best, but Nestea and Lipton work just fine.

name: Mistletoe
instructions: In highball glass filled with ice, comibine creme de almond, white creme de cacao, swiss mocha cream & grenadine. Fill glass with half-and-half. Top with coca-cola. Garnish with filbert nuts or cherries.

name: Mistolin
instructions: Fill the glass half-way with ice. Pour the Vodka, add the orange juice and finally pour the cranberry juice. Stir gently.

name: Mirage
instructions: Shake with ice and stir in chilled glasses. Garnish with a strawberry.

name: Misty Loch
instructions: Pour the 3 first ingredients into a shaker with ice, shake, strain into a brandy snifter and add the 2 little dashes of Kahlua.

name: Mithering Bastard
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Moana Sands
instructions: Pour Chambord and Peach schnapps over crushed ice in a collins glass. Fill up to half with coconut syrup and fill the other half with orange juice and stir. After a few minutes the juice and syrup separate from the alchohol and it looks like sand but tastes MUCH better. Garnish with paper umbrella through a marachino cherry and orange wedge.

name: The Moby
instructions: pour surge then vodka, enjoy!

name: Missle Pop
instructions: Fill glass with ice and add vodka, pineapple juice and fruit punch. Fill with orange juice.

name: Mudslide #5
instructions: Combine over Ice. Stir.

name: Mudslide #4
instructions: Two methods of mixing: 1) straight up on the rocks - mix the 4 ingredients and pour over ice. -- 2) Frozen - mix 4 ingredients in a blender, add ice until frostly.

name: Mudslide #1
instructions: Mix with cracked ice in a shaker. Serve in a chilled highball glass

name: Mudslide #3
instructions: Just get a high-ball glass and add your 1 or 2 shot(s) of Bailey's, then your 1 or 2 shots of Tia Maria, then just simply slowly top the glass with the coca-cola. It will fizz alot so watch out! Due to the fizz a straw is a definate recommindation.

name: Mudslide #2
instructions: measure all ingredients into a shot glass and drink

name: Mudslinger
instructions: Add all contents to a large jug or punch bowl. Stir well!

name: Mudwrestle
instructions: mix in shaker, serve over lots of ice

name: Nutty Ginger
instructions: Put the amaretto and frangelico in the glass. Fill with ginger ale. Add a few ice cubes.

name: Nutty Irishman
instructions: Serve over ice

name: Nutty Irish Coffee
instructions: Fill mug 2/3 full with coffee. Add liquers, chocolate syrup, and stir. Top it off with a mound of whipped cream, sprinkle it with cinnamon or nutmeg if desired.

ingredients: A few Drops green Food coloring
name: NyQuil
instructions: Mix and serve to cure the common cold.

ingredients: A little freshly squeezed Lemon juice
name: Nystedt
instructions: Shake the orange juice and the grape tonic with lots of ice in a shaker. Pour it in a glass and add the 7-Up and the Vodka. Last, add some lemon and decorate with one slice of orange and one slice of lemon.

name: Nutty Irishman #2
instructions: Prepare a cafe-latte as normal. Add liquors acording to taste. Serve hot or over ice as a chilled coffee beverage.

name: Nutty Irishman (without milk)
instructions: Pour the Frangelico first over a glass with ice. Then, pour the Bailey's over the top, but do not stir the drink.

name: Nutz 'n Berries
instructions: Mix like most shots: Chill in a mixing tin and strain in a shot glass.

name: Nutty Russian
instructions: Serve well mixed over ice. Yo can add 1 part milk if desired.

name: Nägermeister
instructions: Kahlua. Add Jäger. Fill up with coffee. Serve with cream.

name: Oasis
instructions: Shake and serve over ice.

name: Oatmeal Cookie with Raisins
instructions: Blend, add ice, strain into rocks glass

name: Oatmeal Cookie
instructions: With ice, shake/stir and serve in shot glasses. The original drink called for the Goldslager but I actually like it with HotDam better..

name: Oatmeal Raisin Cookie
instructions: Equal parts. All ingredients are measured equally in no particular order.

name: Ocean Drive
instructions: Pour liquour first over ice. Add juices cranberry last down side of glass.

name: Occhi Blu
instructions: Mix all ingridients in a mixing glass. Serve in a cocktail glass. garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Oaxaca Jim
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, orange juice, grapefruit juice, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with the cubes. Garnish with the lemon twist and the cherry.

ingredients: As much as you wish Salt
name: Obadoba
instructions: Mix the o'boy n' the salt in a tall glass, add the heated milk. Put some whipped cream at the top and serve.

name: Octapussy
instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a cocktail glass. Give it a shake to the right and a shake to the left. Pour into the cocktail glass.

name: ODWITS
instructions: Mix Tequila, vodka and southern comfort. Add a few rocks of ice and top up with fresh orange juice. Add just a dash of Galliano and stir. Serve with a large slice of lemon.

name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster
instructions: Take a pintglass (= approx. 0.5 litres) Put the Tia Maria, the vodka and the cherry brandy together. Add a dash of lime juice. Fill the rest of the glass up with (50% - 50%) with dry cider and 7 -up Add ice cubes.

name: Panama Deluxe
instructions: Shake all ingredients together, serve in a tumbler over ice.

name: Panther Sweat
instructions: Shake the ingredients together with crushed ice. Strain into glass. Good with crushed salt on the rim of the glass.

name: Panty Dropper
instructions: Fill tall glass with ice: add 1 oz Kahlua: add 1 oz Sloe Gin: fill glass to top with half and half

name: Papaya Driver
instructions: Rum first, then Papaya Juice

name: Papaya Milk Splash
instructions: Make sure to clean out the seeds and deskin the papaya. Put the papaya along with all other ingredients in a blender, mix at medium to high speed for about one to two minutes. Serve immediately.

name: Papaya Sling
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water and pineapple stick) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the pineapple stick and serve.

name: Panther
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over several ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Papa Doble
instructions: Shake rum, grapefruit juice, and lime juice with ice and pour or strain into glass. Add a splash of grenedine.

name: Paralyzer #1
instructions: Built in a 8-10 oz zombie or collins glass,over ice .First add the tequila, vodka & kahlua.fill glass 1/2 full with coke,then top with light cream or milk.There is no garnish. but stir gently with straw.

name: Paralyzer #2
instructions: Above amounts are for an 8 oz glass. Build over ice: Kahlua, then Vodka, milk, then Coke.

name: Paralyzer #3
instructions: In an 8 oz. glass mix Kalhua, Vodka, Rum, and Coke over ice. Fill rest of glass with Milk and stir.

name: Parappa the Drunk Rappa
instructions: Pour shots over ice, add coke and strain into glass

name: Parisette
instructions: Pour grenadine syrup over some ice cubes in a large tumbler. Stir. Fill up with cold milk. Stir again, serve with a drinking straw.

name: Paris Paradise
instructions: Pour ingredients in a blender, mix them together, and serve in a beer pilsner.

name: Participle
instructions: Mix liqueur, juice and vodka in a highball glass. Add ice and fill the glass with sprite. You can decorate the drink with a slice of orange, lemon or kiwi if you want.

name: Parrot Perch
instructions: Put liquor, juice, and syrup in blender. Add the sliced banana and ice. Blend for 45 seconds or until smooth.

name: Parisian
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Park Avenue
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Party Death
instructions: Just mix them together, softs first, then the vodka. Serve ice cold.

name: The Party Girl
instructions: In a shaker, mix all ingredients, shake well. Serve over ice, garnish with a lime wedge (optional)

name: Party Punch
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl.

name: Party Slush Punch #1
instructions: Mix ingredients together, freeze to slush consistency and serve "slushy".

name: Party Slush Punch #2
instructions: Put the ingredients into a container in the freezer (stir occasionally while freezing). To serve: put 2/3 slush to 1/3 7-up in each glass or same ratio in punch bowl.

name: Perfect Flaming Dr. Pepper
instructions: In the shot glass, pour amaretto, then kahlua, then root beer schnapps. Finally float rum on top. Fill a beer mug (with something like bud or coors) half way. Light shot on fire, drop into beer mug and slam as fast as you can! By the way, the faster its slamed, the more it tastes like Dr. Pepper

name: Party Slush Punch #3
instructions: Mix the following ingredients together and freeze. When slushy, drink as is or mix with 7-UP.

name: Perfect Kiss
instructions: Put the crushed ice in the glass. Add spirits and top with Sprite. Gently place one half strawberry underneath the layer of crushed ice. Serve.

name: Perfect Manhattan
instructions: Swirl with ice to chill and pour.

name: Perfect Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: The Perfect Margarita #2
instructions: Shake like crazy with about 6 ice cubes. Pour into a chilled margarita glass, rimmed with lime juice and salt. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: The Perfect Margarita #1
instructions: Put all ingredients except the 3 lime wedges into a shaker. Squeeze 2 of the lime wedges into the shaker. SHAKE WELL! Rim outside of glass only, with lime. Salt only the outside of glass. Add fresh crushed ice to glass. Strain mixture over ice. Squeeze remaining lime wedge in glass. Enjoy!

name: Perfect Rob Roy
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, sweet vermouth, and dry vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the cherry or a lemon twist.

name: The Perfect Ten
instructions: First add the alcohol, then the rest is 50/50 of the lemon juice and the sprite. Don't put any ice in it!!!

name: Perroquet
instructions: Pour over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with cold water and stir well.

name: Peter Pan Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Petit Zinc
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry or a slice of orange.

name: Petite Fleur
instructions: Shake and strain.

name: Petticoat Lane
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, and Campari. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: The Phantom
instructions: Take a longdrink glass and fill it with ice. Mix Licor 43 and Absolut vodka, fill up with milk. In the summer you can mix the drink with icecream and make a very nice milkshake.

name: Phi Psycho Psycho
instructions: Mix in large punch bowl to your liking.

name: Period in a Pitcher
instructions: Mix the three cans (Punch, Pink Grapefruit Juice, and Orange Juice) in a pitcher. Add six shots of Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum. Add crushed ice to fill pitcher. Keep chilled in refrigerator.

name: The Pernod Demon
instructions: 1) Coat the lemon wedge with sugar 2) Douse the lemon wedge with the 6 dashes of tobasco 3) Fill the shot glass with pernod To administer this shot, suck the lemon and then shoot the pernod.

name: Phillips Screwdriver
instructions: Place 2-3 ice cubes in your choice of glass, pour 2oz vodka followed by 6oz Sunny Delight (more or less to taste). Stir and serve.

name: Phoenix Paradise
instructions: Place all of the ingredients into a blender and blend for about 20 - 30 seconds. Then pour into a hi-ball glass or a Gibralter 14 oz glass.

name: Photon Torpedo
instructions: Mix the Aftershock with vodka, in no particular order.

name: Phreaker Cocktail
instructions: Fill a fifth bottle half vodka, half water.Leaving enough water out to add the egg white.Shake well until egg is thoroughly mixed. Add into punch bowl with the Triple Sec,pineapple juice, and lemon juice.Add sugar. (more or less for taste).

name: Pic-Walsh
instructions: Swirl all ingredients in a blender.

name: Picasso "1"
instructions: Combine ingredients in the order listed into a shaker. Fill half full with ice and shake well. Strain into collins glass with ice. Top with Schweppes Russain. Garnish with a slice of lime, a minth leave and a straw.

name: PEZ
instructions: mix all three ingredients together over ice in tumbler. shake well. for shot, strain ice. for drink, retain ice. adjust sour mix ratio to taste.

name: Piccadilly Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Poison Ivy
instructions: Pour chilled ingredients into a shot glass. Can be made layered or mixed. If layered pour the Aftershock in first, then slowly layer the Kahlua on top.

name: Polar Bear #2
instructions: Just blend with ice in a highball glass.

name: Poison Milk
instructions: Mix in shot glass. Close your eyes and shoot it real fast.

name: Poison
instructions: mix the Vodka and the Parfait d'Amour in the glass and fill of with Bitter Lemon

name: Polar Bear #3
instructions: Mix drinks over ice before serving in a shot glass. Tastes like a peppermint patty!

name: Polar Bear, Swedish
instructions: Mix Absolut Vodka and Blue Curaco, fill it up with Sprite. Use lots of icecubes.

name: Polarbear #1
instructions: Take one part vodka into the glass, pour one part lime in the same glass. Then you take two parts of 7-up or sprite. Mix this together with a straw or something like that. Ice is recommended.

name: Polkagris
instructions: Mix the fluids into the glass, add a couple ice cubes and (one or) two cherries. Use a thick, red and white striped straw.

name: Polish Professor
instructions: In an old fashioned glass filled with ice, add the Vodka, followed by the Pineapple juice, and last, the 7-Up. Stir and serve.

name: Polo Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Polonaise
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Polynesian Cocktail
instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime and dip into powdered sugar. Shake vodka, cherry brandy, and juice of lime with ice, strain into the sugar-rimmed glass, and serve.

name: Ponche de Pina
instructions: Peel pineapples, chop or shread. Add water and let stand overnight. Put in large saucepan with spices, sugar, and coconut milk. Boil for 5 minutes. Strain liquid into large pitcher. Add rum and serve hot.

name: Mocha Frappe
instructions: Pour chilled coffe, milk, and instant chocolate milk powder into blender. Mix together. Add Whipped cream and Ice Cream, and Blend together at 'Frappe' setting. Pour into mug.

name: Mocha Maria
instructions: Half fill a shaker with ice. Add ingredients, shake, and pour over ice.

name: Mocha Mint Irish Cream Cappuccino
instructions: By adding the steamed milk last, the ingredients mix well. Make sure to stir all of the chocolate from the bottom of glass.

name: Mocha Martini
instructions: mix ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass

name: Mocha Mint
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Mocha Mudslide Milkshake
instructions: Place first 4 ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Freeze in blender container for 1 hour or until slightly frozen. Loosen frozen mixture from the sides of blender container, add yoghurt and blend until smooth. Garnish with banana slices. Serve immediately.

name: Mocha-Berry
instructions: pour 6 oz. of coffee in a mug or Irish coffee cup. add coca mix and chambord, mix well and top off with whipped cream.

name: Muff Diver
instructions: Mix all the alcohol in a shaker with ice, strain into a shot glass. Place shot glass into a wide-mouth rocks glass or similar container, fill rest of glass with whipped cream and add cherry (optional).

name: Mock Pink Champagne #1
instructions: Boil sugar and water until sugar dissolves, cool. Stir cranberry, pineapple, orange juices. Chill. Just before serving, add carbonated beverage.

name: Mule
instructions: Pour 1 1/4 ounce of Smirnoff Vodka in glass, fill with ginger beer, add ice and squeeze lime.

name: Mulled Madeira
instructions: Combine first 6 ingredients in a large saucepan and bring almost to simmer over medium heat. Reduce heat and cook for 10 minutes (do not simmer). Add Cointreau and stir until hot. Serve warm in heat proof glasses or mugs, leaving peel and spices in pan.

name: Mulled Wine
instructions: Simmer 3 cups water with, sugar, cloves, cinnamon sticks, and lemon peel in a stainless steel pot for 10 minutes. Add wine heat to a "coffee temperature" (DO NOT BOIL) then add the brandy.

name: Mullens Mai Tai
instructions: Combine ingredients in an empty shaker. Shake vigorously then pour contents into a tall cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange, a wedge of pineapple or a cherry (or all three).

name: Multi-coloured Smurf
instructions: First shake the orange juice, vodka, and Mango Syrup with the ice in a shaker. Float the apricot liquer, and blueberry schnapps in cocktail glass. Then float the shaken vodka and juices.

name: Multiple Orgasm #1
instructions: Build over ice. Garnish with strawberries or cherries.

name: Multiple Orgasm #2
instructions: Pour ingredients into a blender and mix until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass and top with a cherry. It tastes like a chocolate shake, but with a kick!

name: Mumbo Jumbo
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

name: Mumsicle
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, bourbon, and bitter. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry

name: The Mummy
instructions: Mix vodka, triple sec, and lemon juice in an old fashioned glass half filled with ice. Top off with club soda. Stir.

name: Mundo Fine
instructions: Shake or mix all ingredients, and pour over ice cubes into a collins glass, (or any glass large enough,) Garnish with an orange slice, a lemon slice, and a cherry if so desired.

name: Muppet
instructions: With the shot glass you pour half a glass with Tequila and the other half with 7-up. Take the glass already filled with both drinks, take it with palm holding the top of the glass (so the liquid would not come out) and you hit to the table so it will stirr, and you drink the whole.

name: Murder in the Forest
instructions: Use a shaker: put in cracked ice and orange juice, then put in Vodka, Pisang Ambon and Pina Colada and give it all a good shake. Poor in glass ( if you like you can put in a cube of ice or two ). Poor a dash of grenadine in ( slowly ). Serve with cherry and straw. Enjoy!

name: Murray's Cocktail
instructions: Put ice cubes in glass. Pour rum, vodka, and citron vodka into glass. Fill with 7-up. Mix.

name: Mussaka
instructions: 1 oz ouzo 1/2 oz drambuie in an old fashion glass fill with pepsi cola add ice if desired

name: Mussolini
instructions: Mix and pour into shot glass(es).

name: Mutated Mothers Milk
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Let stand for 3-5 minutes to chill. Pour into shot glass and enjoy.

name: Multiple Orgasm Cajun Style
instructions: Add all ingredients in the blender and blend until smooth.

name: Mutiny
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Dubonnet, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

name: Mutual Orgasm
instructions: Pour ingredients into a pint glass half-filled with ice cubes. Alternately pour to another glass 3 or 4 times until chilled.

name: MVP's Strawberry Bomb
instructions: Makes 3 shots.Shake ingredients with ice and strain into shot glasses. Savor the scent for a moment and SLAM

name: My Antonella
instructions: In a highball glass, combine Gin and Chambord over ice. Stir. Add two Italian green olives and fill with tonic water. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: My Busted Cherry
instructions: Drain cherry juice out of jar and fill with rum. Let set overnight in refridgerator. -- In blender mix six (your choice) cherries, ice cream, milk, rum, and chocolate syrup (to taste). Blend until smooth. Add more milk or ice cream as needed.

name: Off your ass in a glass
instructions: No organized mixing require. Put all ingredients in a glass, stir, and drink straight. Then you had better lie down.

name: Oil Slick #2
instructions: Place The Creme de menthe in a shot glass, using a tea spoon carefully float the Black Sambuca on top.

name: Ogre Drink
instructions: Put all ingred. in a bleander and blend untill smooth. Pour into a beer mug and enjoy

name: Oil Slick
instructions: Mix both ingredients together in a shaker and serve in a chilled shot glass.

name: Oil Spill
instructions: Layer Jägermeister on top of the Goldschlager.

name: Okapi
instructions: Stir all of the ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Oklahoma Tropical Twister
instructions: Place both cans of Cream of Coconut (unopened) in hot water for 10 minutes. Then pour the Pineapple Juice, Orange Juice, Cream of Coconut, and Grenadine in a large punch bowl. Stir for 3 minutes to ensure proper mixture. You can add the liqour in with the mix or add it to each drink as it is poured. 1.5 oz per 12 oz drink. By leaving out the Spiced Rum the kids can drink this as well. It is a great NAB drink. Serve over crushed ice. Place the Pineapple Wedge, Orange Wedge, and the Cherry on a tooth pick and drop in drink. For a Oklahoma Frozen Twister place all the ingredients in a blender with a 12 oz cup of ice and blend til smooth. Then add garnish.

name: Old Fashioned Hot Buttered Rum
instructions: In 2-quart suacepan combine sugar, brown sugar and butter. Cook over low hear, stirring occasionally, until butter is melted (6-8 min). In large mixing bowl, combine cooked mixture with ice-cream, beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often until smooth (1-2 min). Store refrigerated up to 2 weeks or frozen up to one month. For each serving, fill mug with 1/4 cup mixture, 1 oz. rum and 3/4 cup boiling water, sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Old Pal Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Olive in an Olive
instructions: Pour Tequila, Red Sweet Vermouth and Blue Curacao over very cold ice in a shaker. Shake. Strain into glass and drop in olive. The drink should be the appx. colour of the olive.

name: Old-Fashioned
instructions: Muddle the orange, sugar, bitters and water in an old-fashioned glass until the sugar is almost dissolved. Fill the glass with ice and add blended whiskey. Garnish with a marachino cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

name: Olle Goop
instructions: Just mix in a highball glass.

ingredients: 8 cl champagne flavored Carbonated soft drink
name: Olsen Driver
instructions: Mix with ice.

name: Olympia-Flip
instructions: Put ingredients in shaker with ice, shake very well, pour out in a cocktail glass and put some fine cracked almonds over it as a decoration.

name: On the Deck
instructions: For best results mix all ingredients into a frosted Mug.

name: Olympia
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Once-Upon-A-Time
instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Ooo
instructions: Serve over ice.

name: On My Ass
instructions: Poor liqour equally into a shot glass. Give it a quick swirl and top with a cherry.

name: Opal Cocktail
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Opening Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Opera Cocktail
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Opera House Special
instructions: Put all ingredients into a metal mixer and strain into shot glass.

name: Orancio Royal
instructions: Pour Orancio into a champagne flute and fill with Brut Champagne. Garnish with a slice of orange.

ingredients:
to taste
Rose's sweetened lime juice
name: Partymeister
instructions: Pour 2 cl of gin (no special gin required) in a glass. Add 2 cl of Malibu. On top of that, enough of Rose'e lime juice to match the taste of Malibu. Fill up with lemonade. Add some ice and a straw.

name: Pascal
instructions: Pour licor 43 and Midori in a glass and fill with milk and ice

name: Passed Out Naked on the Bathroom Floor
instructions: Pour each ingredient into the shot glass, in this order: Rumple Minze, Jägermeister, Jose Cuervo Gold Tequila, then Bacardi 151 Rum. No need to mix, it mixes fine in this order.

name: Passcack Valley Orgasm
instructions: Put in iced shaker and mix well, strain in to a Highball glass

name: Passion Chi-Chi
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a mixer, and then put them in a glass with all ice.

name: Passion Beach
instructions: Shake all ingridients with ice, strain into ice filled highball glass, add some nice fresh fruit on the rim of the glass.

name: Passion Daiquiri
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Passion Mimosa
instructions: Pour passion fruit juice into a champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne, decorate with strawberry, and serve.

name: Passionate Kiss
instructions: Mix over ice, strain into glass. Garnish with flag.

name: Passoa Recovery
instructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass.

name: Passoa Sweet Dreams
instructions: Shake.

name: Passout
instructions: Stir lightly, with or without ice

name: Pat Quinn Float
instructions: Pour the orange pop/soda into a mixing glass and then the scotch whiskey. Shake or stir. Scoop some ice cream into a short, wide glass. Pour the scotch and orange pop/soda into this glass.

name: Pat Quinn Freeze
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into glass. You can either serve it like that or you can also put the drink into a freezer and serve when half-frozen.

name: Picon Biere
instructions: Just mix Amer Picon and beer in a pilsner.

name: Pick Me Up Jose
instructions: Lay shot glass in a CLEAN ash tray right side up, and start to pour the drinks into te glass till they overflow into the ash tray. then light the liquer on fire, blow it out, take the shot from the shot glass, then drink out of the ash tray. ENJOY

name: Pat Quinn
instructions: Pour the orange pop in and then pour the scotch whiskey in. Stir or shake

name: Picon Limon
instructions: Stir Amer Picon, creme de cassis and lime juice with cracked ice and strain into a large chilled wine glass (should hold 16 ounces). Fill with soda water and garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Picon Whiskey
instructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange twist.

name: Piedra Putamadre
instructions: Mix all ingredients

name: Pierced Nipple
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into shot glass.

name: Piggelin #1
instructions: Mix it in a glass 1/4 full of ice...

name: Piggelin #2
instructions: Mix it all in a glass 1/4 full of ice...

name: The Piledriver
instructions: Add 1/3 rum,1/3 vodka , and combine coca-cola and orange juice to fill glass. Add ice if you have room!

name: Pillow Mint
instructions: Add the whiskey fist, then Kahlua. Finally, add a splash of the mint for flavor. Stir and enjoy.

name: Pimm's Cup New Orleans Style
instructions: In an ice filled collins glass, add Pimm's and lemonade. Top with 7-up or ginger ale. Garnish with cucuber slice.

name: Pimm's Cup
instructions: In a highball glass add Pimm's No. 1 and twist of lemon. Fill with 7-up. Garnish with cucumber slice.

name: Pimm's Rangoon
instructions: Pour Pimm's over ice in a large highball glass. Fill with ginger ale and garnish with lemon and cucumber peel.

name: Pimm's Royal
instructions: Pour Pimm's over ice in a large highball glass. Fill with champagne and garnish with lemon and cucumber peel.

name: Pimp & Hoe
instructions: Pour the liquor first, then the OJ and then the lemon juice. Stir the drink a little bit and then drink.

name: Pimp Cocktail
instructions: Just pour them in and stir it up.

name: Pimp Punch
instructions: Mix and pour over ice.

name: Pimp
instructions: Fill the glass half-full of ice, add Jägermeister, and fill up with Battery.

name: Pina Colada #1
instructions: Put all ingredients into an electric blender with 2 cups of crushed ice. Blend at a high speed for a short length of time. Strain into a collins glass and serve with a straw.

name: Pina Colada #2
instructions: Add some crumbled ice, mix it well and pour it into a tall glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh pineapple.

name: Pina Colada Punch
instructions: Chill pineapple juice and soda. Blend first four ingredients in a blender until creamy. (I've found a hand blender works very well since my blender won't hold all of this liquid or you could split it into two batches.) This can be done ahead of time and put back into the fridge until serving time. When your ready to serve, place coconut mixture in punch bowl, add ice-cream and allow it to dissolve somewhat. When ice-cream has dissolved almost completely, add pineapple soda. Add ice ring and decorate the frothy top of the punch with thin orange slices. If you wanted to make this alcoholic, cut back a little on the amount of soda and add a bit of rum - I like it with Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum.

name: Pond water
instructions: Pour 1/2 bottle beer into mug. Fill rest with 1/2 can of Coke.

name: Pine Cone
instructions: In a tall glass, on the rocks, add Southern Comfort and Amaretto. Fill glass with Pineapple juice. Stir.

name: Ponderosa
instructions: Throw it all into a glass, shoot as fast as possible. Do this repeatadly until very inebriated!

name: Pooh Bear
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice.

name: Pooky and Chooky
instructions: Shake with ice. Pour into glass without ice.

name: Poontang
instructions: Mix Vodka and Triple sec first. Add Tang (and water if powdered Tang).

name: Poop Deck Cocktail
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Poop Shoot
instructions: Fill your shot glass 2/3 full with sambuca. Then layer the fruit punch on top by dribbling it over a spoon.

name: Poor Man's Mommosa
instructions: Pour Beer into a highball glass, add orange juice til desired color

name: Popper

name: Popped cherry
